title: THE CLOCKMAKER CONSPIRACY
subtitle: A Web of Gears, Greed, and Betrayal Unwinds in the City’s Heart
teaser: Master clockmaker Hugo Brandt is found dead in his workshop, surrounded by shattered timepieces. Was it a tragic accident, or the work of a rival? The city’s clocks run wild as suspicion falls on all who knew him.
briefing: Hugo Brandt, famed for his intricate automata, was discovered lifeless amid a chaos of broken clocks. His apprentice claims innocence, but rumors swirl of industrial espionage and a secret invention. Can you untangle the gears of conspiracy before time runs out?

workshop_scene.descriptionTemplate: a cramped workshop filled with ticking clocks

pub_gossip.descriptionTemplate: a smoky pub where artisans gather

factory_floor.descriptionTemplate: a bustling factory floor with the scent of oil

characters.name: Elsa Weber
characters.description: A nervous young woman, hands stained with oil.
characters.initialDialogue: "I would never harm Master Brandt! He was like a father to me."

conditionalDialogue.clue_secret: He was working on something new, but wouldn’t tell me what.

characters.name: Foreman Keller
characters.description: A burly man with a suspicious scowl.
characters.initialDialogue: "Brandt’s clocks put us out of business. Good riddance, some say."

characters.name: Sergeant Müller
characters.description: A methodical investigator, notebook always in hand.
characters.initialDialogue: "We’re treating this as suspicious. Too many loose gears for my liking."

clues.title: Broken Clock
clues.discoveryText: A shattered clock, its gears jammed with a foreign object.
clues.notebookSummary: A clock was sabotaged with a piece of wire.

clues.title: Secret Project

clues.notebookSummary: Brandt had a secret project, details unknown.

clues.title: Factory Rivalry
clues.discoveryText: Keller admits the factory lost contracts to Brandt’s superior clocks.

clues.title: Pub Rumor
clues.discoveryText: A patron claims Brandt argued with a mysterious visitor days before his death.
clues.notebookSummary: Brandt was seen arguing with a stranger.

solution.motive: Industrial espionage—Brandt’s invention threatened powerful interests.
solution.method: The visitor sabotaged a clock, causing a fatal accident. The secret project was stolen in the chaos.
